msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Multiple selection and requiresSelection now work together.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

We now use the bottleneck method, updateRenderer() to let the DataGroup have first crack at setting a renderer's data, owner and labelText properties. Then the "true" owners like a List or ButtonBar which father a renderer, get a chance to come in and clean out stale properties and set new properties on the renderer (which was either created anew or recycled).
I also cleaned up some comments in LayoutBase.
Mustella: Steve and Ella ok'ed a cyclone I gave them against List, ButtonBar, DataGroup and SkinnableDataContainer.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Code re-organization, updated ASDoc comments and a few PARB requested re-names (internal methods, shouldn't require updating on the QA side of things).
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Introduces a new method to the IItemRendererOwner contract, updateRendererInformation(), which handles the setting of a renderer's data and data-dependant properties.
We also now support the CollectionEvent of kind UPDATE in DataGroup.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- Added functionality to keep the anchor button in the down state when the dropDown is open.

- Changed SkinnableDataContainer's dataGroup skin part from required to optional. Added some null check protection to List, and ListBase. Changed the DropDownListSkin to only include the dropDown in the open state.
SDK-20534 - DropDownList does not gray out text when disabled
Updated the skin to set the alpha in the disabled state
SDK-20532 - When using scroll bar on the dropDown of a DropDownList the dropDown closes
Added dropDown skinPart that defines the area that doesn't automatically close DropDownList on a mouseDown
SDK-19868 - Gumbo DropDownList should support symbolColor style
Changed the down arrow in the DropDownListButtonSkin to use a radialGradient fill instead of a DropShadowFilter. Also, the PopUp component now passes its styles along to its content.
SDK-19572 - DropDownList popup doesnt close or move when resizing browser window
Added a systemManager resize handler that closes the dropDown
SDK-20535 - DropDownList text styles are not passed on to dropDown and no dropDown styles exist
The PopUp component now passes its styles along to its content.
SDK-20555 - Spark DropDownList should size itself a bit better so partial rows arent displayed if possible
Changed the default size of the dropDown from 140 to 134. This should handle this issue if the DropDownList is using the default item renderer
Doc Notes: Added dropDown skin part to DropDownList
